org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine

Class ValueContext<T,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine.ValueContext<T,V>

  • public class ValueContext<T,V>
extends Object
    An instance of this class is used to collect all the relevant information for validating a single class, property or method invocation.
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik, Gunnar Morling

        public final Object getCurrentValidatedValue()
        Returns the current value to be validated. If a ValidatedValueUnwrapper has been set, the value will be retrieved via that handler.

        the current value to be validated

      • getTypeOfAnnotatedElement

        public final Type getTypeOfAnnotatedElement()
        Returns the declared (static) type of the currently validated element. If a ValidatedValueUnwrapper has been set, the type will be retrieved via that handler.
        Returns:
        the declared type of the currently validated element
